creditline: The Linda and Lawrence Perlman Photography Endowment
description: black and white image; close-up portrait of a woman holding a gun in her outh, eyes closed; text in black marker that reads: "So don't tell her ART can't hurt, she knows better. The believing can pull at one’s soul. So much that one wants to give up."
signed: in C, verso, in black ink: Laura Aguilar 1993
title: Don't Tell Her Art Can't Hurt
